statements: SELECT * FROM architecture_visualization_tool;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM architecture_visualization_tool WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, design_specifications FROM architecture_visualization_tool WHERE project_id > 2 ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM architecture_visualization_tool WHERE project_id = 3 OR project_id = 5;
SELECT project_name, project_plan FROM architecture_visualization_tool ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, design_specifications, project_plan FROM architecture_visualization_tool WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM architecture_visualization_tool WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM architecture_visualization_tool ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM architecture_visualization_tool;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM architecture_visualization_tool WHERE project_name LIKE '%tool%' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_plans;
SELECT project_name, design_specifications FROM project_plans;
SELECT project_name FROM project_plans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM design_specifications ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT plan_id, specification_text FROM design_specifications WHERE id < 5;
SELECT * FROM project_plans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_name, design_specifications FROM project_plans WHERE project_name LIKE 'Project%';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) FROM project_plans GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM project_plans INNER JOIN design_specifications ON project_plans.id = design_specifications.plan_id;
SELECT project_name, specification_text FROM project_plans INNER JOIN design_specifications ON project_plans.id = design_specifications.plan_id WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
SELECT * FROM project_plans;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project_plans WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT design_name FROM design_specifications ORDER BY design_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM project_plans WHERE project_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project_plans WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT * FROM design_specifications ORDER BY design_id DESC
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project_plans WHERE project_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT * FROM ProjectPlans ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT project_name, project_owner FROM ProjectPlans WHERE project_owner='John Doe'
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM ProjectPlans WHERE project_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT project_id, project_name, created_date FROM ProjectPlans WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_owner FROM ProjectPlans ORDER BY project_owner ASC, project_id
SELECT * FROM ProjectPlans WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_name, project_owner FROM ProjectPlans WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE join_date < NOW()
SELECT progress_status, progress_notes FROM ProjectProgress WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY last_updated_date DESC
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM DesignSpecifications WHERE design_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM project_plans;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project_plans ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM project_plans;
SELECT team_name, designer_name FROM project_teams JOIN designers ON team_lead = designer_id;
SELECT spec_name AS specification_name, spec_description AS description FROM design_specifications WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_teams ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project_plans WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, designer_name FROM project_teams JOIN designers ON project_teams.team_lead = designers.designer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_teams FROM project_teams;
SELECT project_name, last_updated FROM project_plans WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
